story.text: Jan 3 (Reuters) - LANDEC CORP. (LNDC.O) Latest Forecast* No. of Yr ago analysts qtr EPS (diluted, $/shr) 0.00 -- -- -0.04 Net ($ thousands) 108 -- -- -1,037 Revenue ($ million) 55.2 57.0 5 53.7 *Source: Reuters Estimates --The company said its net income for the latest quarter included seasonal operating losses at Landec Ag of $3.1 million. The losses will not recur due to the sale of Fielder's Choice Direct on Dec. 1, the company added. --For the latest quarter, five analysts on average expected the company to post a loss of 2 cents a share before exceptional items, according to Reuters Estimates. (Reporting by Suzannah Benjamin in Bangalore)
story.title: table - landec
